tests.name: README has a short note (or was updated)
tests.run: bash -lc 'if git rev-parse --verify origin/main >/dev/null 2>&1; then git diff --name-only origin/main...HEAD | grep -q ^A02-collab/README.md$ || grep -Ei '''result|figure|summary|method|bins|hist|png''' A02-collab/README.md; else grep -Ei '''result|figure|summary|method|bins|hist|png''' A02-collab/README.md; fi'
